install: python3 --version && cd tools && python3 -c 'import claude_repository_builder; print("✅ Repository builder module ready")'

terminals.name: Repository Builder Testing
terminals.command: cd tools && echo '🚀 Ready to test claude_repository_builder.py' && bash
terminals.description: Testing environment for the repository builder script

terminals.name: Output Monitoring
terminals.command: cd logs/claude_export_repository && echo '📁 Monitoring output directory' && bash
terminals.description: Monitor generated files and test results
